attributes.action: Make phones allowed at social time in all UK schools
attributes.additional_details: So kids can have a healthier and easier time at school
attributes.background: To make phones allowed at social times to contact family members And to be more social

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about behaviour policies in schools, including when mobile phones are allowed to be used, are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require schools to allow children to bring a mobile phone into school: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598241
